extendedInfo.description: Reading Bee Audiobooks are now Text Synchronized!  Creating text synchronized audiobook is a manual time consuming process.  We are in the process of publishing a large number of digital talking books for people who wish to hearâand navigateâwritten material presented in an audible format.Reading Bee indexes Top Rated Audio Books and combine with the most powerful multimedia playback controls & functions to promote the joy of reading and the love of good books!Reading Bee is not only an audio book reader, it is the ultimate learning application that contains everything you need to learn to read and speak fluently.Read or listen to your favorite books while improve your reading/language skills. Each book comes with audio and transcripts at your finger tips for live streaming or download.  The latest update includes our innovative audio transcript sychronization feature.  Designed to work on both phones and tablets. Please download Reading Bee Premium edition to make a contribution to help us promote reading and learning.Enjoy!

reviews.title: why lead us to your FB
reviews.comment: Liked them on FB but CANNOT DOWNLOAD ANYTHING to my sony Xperia Z EVEN PAYED FOR PREMIUM!

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: Advertised as \"free\" but the app is not usable unless you pay a hefty premium. Uninstall immediately as I have no tolerance for scams.
reviews.author: Jay Bouajram

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: When on fb, liked them and then it said an error occured... Crying 2 yr old wants to read. Thanks a lot :( _____|_____

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is such an awesome app.I got what I really wanted . It needs to have more number of books though ,and when it\'s done ,you get a  deserving 5 stars:-).

reviews.title: Bah! Noble concept.
reviews.comment: Unfortunately it doesn\'t allow download unless you buy the premium version.. which doesn\'t appear to exist!! Virtually useless when you don\'t have a reliable cell connection. Oh! AND it\'s impossible to read their multi-colored text through the vivid background pics which are everywhere in the app. Very disappointed, but I\'m uninstalling.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Loving it so far but I do have a few connection issues. I also can\'t figure out how to get back to categories. Everytime I reopen it takes me back to the category I was at so I\'m stuck in fiction.
